TextLibrary.Text: Here you go, Drong. One Wyvern.
Here you go, Drong. One Wyvern.
Here you go, Drong. One Wyvern.
Here you go, Drong. One Wyvern.
You good man. Drong eat Wyvern now. He see you later in Gluk when he feel better. Drong have special request for you.
